articles.author: Heinz Schenk
articles.title: 'Lobbyist' Elgar praises Nkwe for Maketa's Proteas role: 'He has cricket at heart'
articles.description: Proteas Test skipper Dean Elgar has praised national director of cricket Enoch Nkwe for "having cricket at heart" in appointing Malibongwe Maketa as interim red-ball coach.
articles.content:
• Proteas Test skipper Dean Elgar has praised national director of cricket Enoch Nkwe for "having cricket at heart" in appointing Malibongwe Maketa as interim red-ball coach.

articles.title: Jadeja v Jadeja in Jamnagar? 'No', says cricketer Ravindra Jadeja's sister
articles.description: Gujarat election: Rivaba Jadeja, Ravindra Jadeja's wife, is the BJP candidate from the Jamnagar (north) seat.
articles.content: Is it a 'Jadeja v Jadeja' contest for the Jamnagar (north) seat in Gujarat? 'No'... according to Congress leader Naina Jadeja - sister-in-law to BJP lawmaker-hopeful Rivaba Jadeja and sister to her h… [+2554 chars]

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
